name: Rank With Schema
author: Shakeel Mumtaz

sections.description:
Schema and Structured data are now an important signal for Search Engines and hence it improves SEO for your website that results in better CTR and high Search Engine Rankings.

Implementation Schema as per Google recommendations is really an hectic part of website optimization, even some SEO experts are found complaining complexity of implementing Structured Data or Schema successfully.

Wait!

We have made it easy for everyone. You can use Schema on your website in simple way with RankWithSchema plugin. No matter you’re a newbie, designer, business owner or WordPress expert, this is for everyone.

Here’s the list of Schemas you can use:

Free Version:

  • Article
  • Breadcrumb List
  • Event
  • Logo
  • Product
  • Review
  • Site Link Search Box
  • Social Profile

Pro Version:

  • Article
  • Breadcrumb List
  • Event
  • Logo
  • Product
  • Review
  • Site Link Search Box
  • Social Profile
  • Book
  • Carousel
  • Corporate Contact
  • Course
  • DataSet
  • Employer Aggregate Rating
  • Fact Check
  • Job Posting
  • Live Stream
  • Local Business
  • Occupation
  • QnA
  • Recipe
  • Software Application
  • Video
  • Movie
  • Music
  • TV Episode
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rank-with-schema directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the “Rank With Schema” settings screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How to install and use this Schema plugin?

After you Active this plugin, just go to Dashboard > Rank With Schema Settings, and then setup the default settings, after that, just go back to Post/Page and add any data that you like!

How do I report bugs and suggest new features?

You can report the bugs for this Schema plugin at shakeel@rankwithschema.com

Will you include features to my request?

Yes, Absolutely! We would love to hear your suggestions and feature request.

How do I get in touch?

You can contact us from here
